1000.name: ErrInstallCiliumCode
1000.long_description: Error occurred while installing Cilium mesh through Cilium

1002.name: ErrMeshConfigCode
1002.long_description: Error getting MeshSpecKey config from in-memory configuration
1002.suggested_remediation: Reconnect the adaptor to the meshkit server

1003.name: ErrRunCiliumCmdCode
1003.probable_cause:
Corrupted cilium binary
Command might be invalid

1004.name: ErrDownloadBinaryCode
1004.long_description: Error occurred while download Cilium binary from its github release

1005.name: ErrInstallBinaryCode
1005.probable_cause:
Corrupted Cilium release binary
Invalid installation location

1006.name: ErrSampleAppCode
1006.long_description: Error occurred while trying to install a sample application using manifests
1006.suggested_remediation: Reconnect your adapter to Meshery Server to refresh the kubeclient

1007.name: ErrCustomOperationCode
1007.long_description: Error occurred while applying custom manifest to the cluster
1007.suggested_remediation: Upload the kubconfig in the Meshery Server and reconnect the adapter

1008.name: ErrCreatingNSCode
1008.long_description: Error occurred while applying manifest to create a namespace
1008.suggested_remediation: Upload the kubeconfig in the Meshery Server and reconnect the adapter

1009.name: ErrRunExecutableCode
1009.suggested_remediation: Check if the adaptor is executing a deprecated command

1011.name: ErrOpInvalidCode
1011.long_description: Cilium adapter received an invalid operation from the meshey server
1011.probable_cause:
The operation is not supported by the adapter
Invalid operation name
1011.suggested_remediation: Check if the operation name is valid and supported by the adapter

1012.name: ErrApplyHelmChartCode
1012.short_description: Error occurred while applying Helm Chart

1013.name: ErrNilClientCode
1013.suggested_remediation: Reconnect the adaptor to Meshery server

1017.name: ErrParseCiliumCoreComponentCode
1017.short_description: Cilium core component manifest parsing failing

1018.name: ErrParseOAMComponentCode
1018.long_description: Error occurred while prasing application component in the OAM request made
1018.probable_cause: Invalid OAM component passed in OAM request
1018.suggested_remediation: Check if your request has vaild OAM components

1019.name: ErrParseOAMConfigCode
1019.long_description: Error occurred while prasing component config in the OAM request made
1019.probable_cause: Invalid OAM config passed in OAM request
1019.suggested_remediation: Check if your request has vaild OAM config

1020.name: ErrGetLatestReleaseCode
1020.probable_cause: Latest version could not be found at the specified url

1024.name: ErrGetManifestNamesCode
1024.short_description: Unable to fetch manifest names from github

1025.name: ErrMakingBinExecutableCode
1025.short_description: Error while making cilium cli an executable

1026.name: ErrLoadNamespaceCode
1026.probable_cause: Trying to access a namespace which is not available
1026.suggested_remediation: Verify presence of namespace. Confirm Meshery ServiceAccount permissions

1029.name: ErrDownloadingTarCode
1029.short_description: Error occurred while downloading Cilium tar
1029.probable_cause: Error occurred while download cilium tar from its release url

1030.name: ErrGettingReleaseCode
1030.probable_cause: Latest version could not be found at the specified url
1030.suggested_remediation:
Verify network connectivity.
Ensure github.com is reachable.
Try retrying the operation.
